hero.title: Expand your trading opportunities
hero.text: Absolute Finance provides a structured approach to global markets, combining transparent conditions, advanced tools, and professional guidance to help clients build sustainable results.

why.title: Why join Absolute Finance?
why.list1.title: Quick access to funds
why.list1.text: Withdrawals are processed efficiently, giving clients reliable access to their money at any time.
why.list2.title: Fast trade execution
why.list2.text: Orders are executed within fractions of a second, ensuring speed and consistency in market operations.
why.list3.title: Competitive spreads
why.list3.text: Absolute Finance provides stable trading conditions with spreads starting from 0 pips, supporting cost-effective execution.
why.list4.title: Reliable security standards
why.list4.text: Absolute Finance applies advanced data protection measures, encrypted transactions, and strict compliance controls to safeguard client accounts and trading operations.
why.list5.title: Broad asset coverage
why.list5.text: Trade across forex, indices, commodities, shares, and cryptocurrencies through a single platform.
why.list6.title: Swap-free options
why.list6.text: All clients can trade without overnight charges, allowing greater flexibility in managing positions.

info.list1.title: Competitive spreads on currencies
info.list1.text: Absolute Finance provides access to major and minor currency pairs with some of the lowest spreads in the market. On EUR/USD, the average spread begins from 0.1 pips, making trading conditions cost-efficient and transparent for clients.
info.list2.title: Swap rates
info.list2.text: Absolute Finance offers competitive swap conditions across a broad range of instruments. These rates allow traders to manage overnight positions more effectively, either reducing holding costs or supporting potential earnings, depending on the chosen strategy.
info.list3.title: Margin requirements
info.list3.text: Absolute Finance applies transparent margin requirements across all instruments. Clear margin rules allow traders to manage leverage effectively, maintain adequate account balances, and control exposure to market risks.

accounts.list1.title: Bronze account
accounts.list1.text1: Ideal for beginners or traders who want to start with a smaller capital.
accounts.list1.text2: Access to a wide range of trading instruments.
accounts.list2.title: Silver account

accounts.list2.text2: Additional trading tools and indicators for advanced analysis.
accounts.list3.title: Gold account
accounts.list3.text1: Suitable for experienced traders who require more advanced features.

client.title: Clients about us
client.list1.text: I’ve been working with Absolute Finance for several months and the conditions have proven reliable. Withdrawals are processed quickly, spreads remain tight, and the platform doesn’t freeze during volatile market hours. The support team is responsive and professional.
client.list1.name: James Turner
client.list2.text: Absolute Finance propose une expérience de trading claire et efficace. Les transactions sont exécutées rapidement, l’accès aux fonds est simple et les actifs disponibles couvrent de nombreux marchés. L’absence de frais overnight est également un atout important pour ma stratégie.
client.list2.name: Sophie Moreau
client.list3.text: Con Absolute Finance mi trovo bene per la trasparenza delle condizioni e la qualità del servizio. L’app mobile funziona senza problemi, permettendo di seguire i mercati in tempo reale. Buona scelta per chi cerca stabilità e strumenti pratici per il trading quotidiano.
client.list3.name: Giovanni Ricci

footer.risk.title: Risk Warning:
footer.risk.text1: Trading leveraged financial instruments such as forex and CFDs carries a significant level of risk and may not be suitable for all investors. You should carefully consider whether you understand how these products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your capital. Losses may exceed your initial deposit, so only risk money you can afford to lose.
footer.risk.text2: CFDs are complex instruments, and a substantial proportion of retail investor accounts lose money when trading them. Before trading with Absolute Finance, please review the full Risk Disclosure Statement and seek independent advice if needed to ensure you are fully aware of potential risks.
